articles.title: Local shares end higher on last-minute buying - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: SHARES rebounded on Monday on last-minute buying, despite fears of an impending rate hike by the US Federal Reserve and a drop in Asian stocks following the coronavirus surge in China.
